name: Sneaky Monsters
storyline: Several years ago a strange object fell from the sky. And soon, monsters began to attack the thriving nearby kingdom. The King, refusing to send his troops to help the population, ordered his army to stand in defense of his castle and locked himself inside. Only the Princess decides to take up the fight and confront the advancing enemy.
summary: Tower Defense with unusual mechanics, where the AI sends the most inconvenient monsters and you have to constantly sell and rebuild towers.
